Home.mainParagraph: Make it Easy. Make it Smart. Make it Circular
Home.exploreTitle: Smart, AI-Powered Vending Machines for Every Need
Home.exploreSubTitle: Our machines go beyond classic vending ‚Äì they‚Äôre smart, AI-powered food solutions. From pizza to beer, each unit analyzes sales in real time, spots trends, and optimizes offerings. AI manages temperature, refills, and customer experience for maximum efficiency and minimal costs.
Home.ourClientsSubTitle: Partnering with businesses of all sizes. We provide customized vending solutions to meet your unique requirements.
Home.serveSubTitle: Our AI-controlled vending machines adapt individually to your requirements. Whether hotel, university or factory floor - the artificial intelligence analyses consumption patterns, automatically adjusts the product range and minimizes downtime. Perfect for busy locations or decentralized sites.
Home.sustainabilityText: With AI, we optimize not just sales processes but also ecological cycles. Our return machines automatically recognize container types and digitalize deposit processes. AI analyzes consumption to prevent food waste. Simultaneously, we collaborate with regional partners on innovative reusable systems ‚Äì made in Saxony.
Home.CloudSystem: Cloud System Powered by Android, AWS, NAYAX
Home.CloudSystemTitle: Take Control of Your Vending Network
Home.CloudSystemSubTitle: Manage your vending machines globally, adjust pricing on the fly, and track key performance indicators‚Äîall from a single, user-friendly dashboard.
Home.naftext3: ‚Äì with the vision of creating real alternatives to traditional Gastronomy. With roots in fine dining and a passion for technology, we combine culinary delight with digitalization. Our AI systems are developed in-house by an international team of IT talents and Gastronomy professionals, under the leadership of our CTO,
Home.naftext4: , who spearheads innovation in AI-driven culinary solutions and technological advancements.

A great concept with really great culinary ideas week after week üëç You can taste that you prepare it with a lot of passion and joy ü´∂ There is something for every taste. Among my favorites were the spinach ricotta dumplings or the hemp bowl etc ... and the desserts anyway üòÖ Keep up the good work üëå

testimonial4.text: Hello dear NAF team, For your continued development, here is some brief feedback on your delicious food. I'm always delighted when I buy food from the NAF vending machine. The offerings are not only varied but also particularly tasty and healthy thanks to the variety of spices. With this in mind, keep up the good work!

nafApp.heading: Everything You Need. One NAF App
nafApp.description: Reserve your food in advance, explore live menus from nearby vending machines, and pay instantly with Scan & Pay. The NAF app brings together food ordering, machine access, and membership benefits ‚Äî all in one seamless experience.

nafCloud.title: NAF Cloud
nafCloud.desc: A centralized cloud platform to manage machines, content, and operations across locations ‚Äî accessible anytime, anywhere.

nafAI.title: NAF AI
nafAI.desc: Smart system logic that supports automation, system efficiency, and future-ready vending operations across the NAF ecosystem.

telemetry.title: Telemetry & Monitoring
telemetry.desc: Real-time machine status, performance insights, and alerts to ensure reliability and smooth daily operations.

payments.title: Payments
payments.desc: Secure, flexible payment options supporting cashless transactions, Scan & Pay, and compliance-ready systems.

reuse.title: Reuse & Return Ecosystem
reuse.desc: A digital return and reuse system designed to support sustainable packaging and circular consumption models.

cloudKitchen.title: Cloud Kitchen System
cloudKitchen.desc: A software layer connecting food preparation, vending machines, and distribution for efficient multi-location operations.

integration.title: Software Integrations
integration.desc: Easy integration with third-party systems such as ERP, payment providers, and enterprise platforms.

whoWeServe.heading: Who We Serve
whoWeServe.subheading: Our smart vending machines adapt to your specific requirements. Whether in hotels, universities, or factory floors, they provide reliable, automated food solutions designed for busy locations and decentralized sites.

hotels.title: Hotels & Resorts
hotels.desc: Provide guests with 24/7 access to fresh food and drinks, enhancing convenience while minimizing staffing or operational complexity.

campgrounds.title: Campgrounds
campgrounds.desc: Offer campers easy access to meals and essentials at any time, even in remote locations.

schools.title: Schools & Universities
schools.desc: Deliver quick, hygienic meals for students and staff, reducing cafeteria pressure.

factories.title: Factories & Industrial Sites
factories.desc: Ensure round-the-clock food availability for all workers, improving productivity.

clinics.title: Clinics & Pharmacies
clinics.desc: Support patients, visitors, and staff with safe and convenient food access.

municipalities.title: Cities & Municipalities
municipalities.desc: Enable smart food infrastructure in public spaces, supporting urban convenience.

seniorHomes.title: Senior Homes
seniorHomes.desc: Provide residents and visitors with easy-to-use food options.

transport.title: Transportation & Rest Areas
transport.desc: Keep travelers fueled with fast, reliable food options.

events.title: Events & Festivals
events.desc: Serve large crowds efficiently with automated food solutions.

offices.title: Offices & Corporate Buildings
offices.desc: Offer employees flexible meal options throughout the day.

machines.FlexiblePaymentTitle: Flexible Payment Options for Your NAF Machines
machines.FlexiblePaymentsubTitle: Our financing models make it easy to enter automated catering. Whether leasing, hire purchase, or direct purchase, we show you the best options and calculate your amortization period. Save on personnel and operating costs from the first month.
machines.Leasingtext: Lease a vending machine with low upfront cost. Pay monthly, then choose to buy, renew, or return at lease end.
machines.Rentaltext: Rent-to-own builds equity over time. Make regular payments, and own the vending machine at the end of the term.
machines.DirectPurchaseSubTitle: Buy vending machines directly ‚Äì immediate ownership from day one. With us, you have the opportunity to purchase our machines directly ‚Äì without complicated leasing contracts or hidden costs.

Maintenance.Requestformfooter: Our team will review your request and contact you shortly.
Maintenance.hospitalitySupport1: As a company with deep roots in the hospitality industry, we know how important reliability, personal support and rapid assistance are. We also live up to this claim when it comes to the maintenance and support of our vending machines. For us, service is not just about technology - it's about genuine hospitality.
Maintenance.hospitalitySupport2: Whether you are a restaurateur or a vending machine operator: We are at your side. Our support is individually tailored to your needs, because no two locations are the same. Whether it's regular maintenance, quick problem solving or software adjustments - we're there for you.
Maintenance.hospitalitySupport3: Direct, uncomplicated, personal: if you wish, we can visit you on site to discuss any questions in peace and quiet. Our team will take the time to listen to your requirements - and ensure that your vending machine is ready for use at all times.

blogPost.blogPostTitle: How UI/UX Design Can Boost Your Vending Machine Sales
blogPost.blogPostContent: In today's fast-paced world, convenience is king. As consumers increasingly seek quick and seamless purchasing experiences, vending machines are becoming more popular than ever. However, the true potential of vending machines is often untapped due to poor user interfaces (UI) and user experiences (UX). Investing in excellent UI/UX design can significantly enhance customer satisfaction and drive sales. Here, we explore how thoughtful design can transform your vending machine business.
blogPost.tableContent1text: One of the most significant ways UI design affects vending machine sales is through an intuitive interface. A confusing layout or unclear instructions can frustrate users, leading them to abandon their purchase. A well-designed UI simplifies the process, making it easy for customers to understand how to make selections, complete payments, and receive their products. Simple elements like a responsive touchscreen with clear buttons and prompts can drastically improve user interaction.
blogPost.tableContent2text: First impressions count, and the visual design of a vending machine plays a crucial role in attracting potential customers. A modern, sleek appearance can draw attention, especially if it aligns with your brand's identity. Vibrant colors, cohesive branding, and high-quality graphics can create a machine that captivates and retains customers' interest. Well-placed promotional content on the display can also entice users with special offers or new product lines.
blogPost.tableContent3text: Beyond aesthetics, a seamless user experience is paramount. The process should be fast and straightforward from start to finish, minimizing friction at every step. This involves optimizing the layout for quick navigation, offering multiple payment options, and ensuring quick product dispensation. Consider adding feedback mechanisms, such as thank-you messages or receipt options, to leave a positive impression.
blogPost.tableContent4text: Incorporating accessibility into your vending machine design is not only a moral and legal obligation but also a strategic advantage. By designing for inclusivity, you ensure that all potential customers, including those with disabilities, can use your machines with ease. Features like height-adjustable interfaces, voice commands, Braille instructions, or larger text can make a significant difference.
blogPost.tableContent5text: Modern consumers appreciate personalized experiences. Advanced vending machines can incorporate AI and data analytics to adapt their offerings based on user preferences and past purchase history. Employing these technologies within your UI/UX design can provide a customized experience, increasing the likelihood of repeat customers. Additionally, adaptability in the interface allows for easy integration of new products and features as trends evolve.
blogPost.tableContent6text: Security features in vending machines are vital for building trust. A robust UX includes demonstrating the safety of transactions, particularly with digital payments. Display security credentials prominently and provide an option for digital receipts. Ensuring customers that their data is secure builds confidence and encourages usage.
blogPost.tableContent7text: Investing in UI/UX design for vending machines isn't just about creating a visually appealing product‚Äîit's about enhancing the overall customer experience. By prioritizing intuitive design, engaging visuals, seamless interactions, inclusivity, personalization, and security, you can significantly increase customer satisfaction and, consequently, boost your vending machine sales. As consumer expectations continue to rise, leveraging impactful design becomes essential in staying competitive and driving growth in the vending industry.

about.heroSubTitleline: A prominent provider of innovative vending machine solutions, committed to delivering cutting-edge products and services that meet the evolving needs of consumers and businesses.
about.AboutText1: NAF Germany was founded in 2024 with a vision to revolutionize the vending experience. We saw an opportunity to combine innovative technology with reliable hardware to create vending solutions that truly meet the needs of modern businesses.
about.AboutText2: Since then, we've been committed to pushing the boundaries of vending technology, developing cutting-edge features and designs that set us apart from the competition.
about.AboutText3: From our early beginnings, we've always prioritized quality, reliability, and customer satisfaction. We're proud to partner with businesses across various industries, helping them streamline operations and enhance their bottom line.
about.missionText1: We are shaping the future of the catering industry ‚Äì with innovative food vending machines that combine quality, sustainability, and convenience. Our goal is to offer real alternatives: to combat staff shortages, rising costs, and rigid opening hours. We create solutions that provide people with good food around the clock ‚Äì flexibly, efficiently, and at the highest quality.
about.visionText1: We envision a world in which healthy, high-quality food is available anytime, anywhere ‚Äì digitally networked, sustainably produced, and intuitively usable. With our vending machine solutions, we want to be leaders in a new era of catering that unites people, technology, and responsibility.

award5.title: Welcome to Germany's largest association of young entrepreneurs and executives

about.ValuesubTitle1: We innovate to create cutting-edge solutions for your business needs.
about.ValuesubTitle2: We deliver high-quality, reliable services built for lasting success.
about.ValuesubTitle3: We ensure dependable solutions with maximum operational efficiency.
about.ValuesubTitle4: We prioritize customer needs, exceeding expectations with every interaction.

privacypolicy.introductionText: New Age of Food (‚Äúwe,‚Äù ‚Äúus,‚Äù or ‚Äúour‚Äù) is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and share information when you use our website https://www.vendinaf.com
privacypolicy.personalInfotext: Information that identifies you, such as your name, email address, phone number, and postal address. We collect this information when you:
privacypolicy.personalInfoList1: Create an account on our Site
privacypolicy.logDatatext: Information that is automatically collected when you access and use our Site, such as your IP address, browser type, operating system, referring URLs, pages visited, and the dates/times of your visits.
privacypolicy.cookiesText: We use cookies and similar technologies to collect information about your browsing activity on our Site. Cookies are small data files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. We use cookies to:
privacypolicy.membershipCardtext: For membership card holders, we collect information related to your card number and purchase history.
privacypolicy.clientAccounttext: For our business clients, we collect information related to usernames, passwords, and usage data.
privacypolicy.legalBasistext: We will only process your personal information where we have a legal basis to do so. This includes:
privacypolicy.legalBasisList2: The performance of a contract with you (e.g., to process your orders)
privacypolicy.legalBasisList4: Our legitimate interests (e.g., to improve our Site and services), provided that your interests and fundamental rights do not override those interests.
privacypolicy.shareInfoText: We may share your information with the following third parties:
privacypolicy.shareInfoList1text: We share information with third-party service providers who assist us with website hosting, payment processing, email marketing, data analytics, and other services. We have contracts with these service providers that require them to protect your information.
privacypolicy.shareInfoList2text: We may share information with our business partners to offer you products or services that may be of interest to you. (We will only do this with your consent.)
privacypolicy.shareInfoList3text: We may disclose your information to legal authorities if required by law or legal process.
privacypolicy.choicesText: You have the following choices regarding your information:
privacypolicy.choicesList1text: You have the right to access and correct your personal information.
privacypolicy.choicesList2text: You can opt-out of receiving marketing communications from us at any time.
privacypolicy.choicesList3text: You can control cookies through your browser settings.
privacypolicy.choicesList4Bold: Right to Erasure ("Right to be Forgotten"):
privacypolicy.choicesList4text: You have the right to request that we erase your personal information under certain circumstances.
privacypolicy.choicesList5text: You have the right to restrict the processing of your personal information under certain circumstances.
privacypolicy.choicesList6text: You have the right to receive your personal information in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format and to transmit that data to another controller.
privacypolicy.choicesList7text: You have the right to object to the processing of your personal information under certain circumstances.
privacypolicy.choicesList8text: If we are processing your personal information based on your consent, you have the right to withdraw your consent at any time.
privacypolicy.securityText: We take reasonable measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage, is 100% secure.
privacypolicy.retentionText: We will retain your information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. For example, we retain contact details for 6 months for tax and accounting purposes. We retain email addresses for newsletter subscribers until they unsubscribe.
privacypolicy.childrenText: Our Site is not directed to children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect any personal information from children under the age of 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.
privacypolicy.linksText: Our Site may contain links to other websites that are not owned or controlled by us. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these other websites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any website you visit.
privacypolicy.transfersText: If you are accessing our Site from outside of Germany, your information may be transferred to and stored in Germany, where our servers are located. To ensure that your personal information is protected when transferred outside the European Economic Area (EEA), we rely on Standard Contractual Clauses approved by the European Commission with our service providers. You can request a copy of these clauses by contacting us.
privacypolicy.gdprText: If you are a resident of the European Economic Area (EEA), you have certain rights under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). These rights include:
privacypolicy.gdprList1text: You have the right to access and correct your personal information. You can do this by logging into your account on our Site or by contacting us directly.
privacypolicy.gdprList2text: You can opt-out of receiving marketing communications from us by clicking the "unsubscribe" link in our emails or by contacting us directly.
privacypolicy.gdprList3text: You can control cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling cookies may affect your ability to use certain features of our Site.
privacypolicy.gdprList4Bold: Right to Erasure ("Right to be Forgotten"):
privacypolicy.gdprList4text: You have the right to request that we erase your personal information under certain circumstances.
privacypolicy.gdprList5text: You have the right to restrict the processing of your personal information under certain circumstances.
privacypolicy.gdprList6text: You have the right to receive your personal information in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format and to transmit that data to another controller.
privacypolicy.gdprList7text: You have the right to object to the processing of your personal information under certain circumstances.
privacypolicy.gdprList8text: If we are processing your personal information based on your consent, you have the right to withdraw your consent at any time.
privacypolicy.controllerText: New Age of Food is the data controller responsible for the processing of your personal information.
privacypolicy.changesText: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will post any changes on our Site. Your continued use of our Site after the posting of changes constitutes your acceptance of the revised Privacy Policy.
privacypolicy.contactText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

footer.subscrptionText: We deliver innovative Vending with seamless tech and design. Subscribe to learn how.

validation.agreementRequired: You must agree to the privacy policy.
validation.selectCategory: Please select at least one category.
validation.acceptPrivacy: You must accept the privacy policy.

faqs.answer1: NAF stands for "New Age of Food" ‚Äì an innovative food and supply concept that combines vending machines, sustainable reusable packaging, smart software solutions, and intelligent sales strategies.
faqs.question2: What is the goal of NAF?
faqs.answer2: Our goal is to rethink gastronomy: 24/7 catering without staff shortages, innovative vending machine solutions, healthy meals, and a financially attractive option for businesses, hotels, public institutions, and more.
faqs.answer3: NAF was founded by Abdelilah Lamkhizni ‚Äì with many years of experience in gastronomy, hospitality, and technology. The company combines culinary expertise with digital solutions.
faqs.question4: What is NAF and what vending machines do you offer?
faqs.answer4: NAF stands for "New Age of Food" and offers a digital, innovative solution for the food service industry. Our vending machines serve fresh, high-quality meals around the clock ‚Äì without the need for staff. We offer:
faqs.list9: Catering machines for hotels, factories, gas stations, schools, etc.
faqs.answer4_2: Each machine is equipped with state-of-the-art technology and can be customized.
faqs.answer5: Our machines feature smart control systems and can be operated contactlessly via card, app, or voucher. Depending on the machine type, meals are served fresh, stored frozen and reheated, or freshly prepared.
faqs.list10: Standard: With NAF logo, free of charge
faqs.question8: Is a digital menu display possible?
faqs.question9: What reusable solutions does NAF offer?
faqs.answer9: We rely on a sustainable system with reusable containers and return machines.
faqs.question10: How does the return machine work?
faqs.answer10: Customers scan a QR code and return the container. The deposit is refunded automatically via customer card or app.
faqs.question11: Are there subsidies for return machines?
faqs.question12: What does the NAF Cloud System offer?
faqs.answer13: Not yet ‚Äì but an app is in development to enable purchases, coupons, feedback, returns, and payments.
faqs.answer14: Multilingual support is integrated ‚Äì ideal for hotels, gas stations, or international customers.

imprints.disputeResolutionText3: We are neither willing nor obligated to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.
imprints.liabilityContentText: As service providers, we are responsible for our own content on webpages in accordance with Section 7 (1) of the German Digital Services Act (DDG).
imprints.liabilityContentText1: However, pursuant to Sections 8 to 10 of the DDG, we are not obliged to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to search for circumstances indicating illegal activity.
imprints.liabilityContentText2: Obligations to remove or block the use of information under general law remain unaffected.
imprints.liabilityContentText3: Liability in this respect is only possible from the moment knowledge of a specific legal infringement is obtained. Upon becoming aware of such violations, we will remove the relevant content immediately.
imprints.liabilityLinksText: Our website contains links to external third-party websites over whose content we have no control. Therefore, we cannot assume any liability for these external contents. The respective provider or operator of the linked pages is always responsible for their content.
imprints.liabilityLinksText1: The linked pages were checked for possible legal violations at the time of linking. No unlawful content was identifiable at that time.
imprints.liabilityLinksText2: However, continuous monitoring of the linked pages is not reasonable without specific evidence of a legal violation. If we become aware of any infringements, we will remove such links immediately.
imprints.copyrightText: The content and works created by the website operators on these pages are subject to German copyright law. Reproduction, editing, distribution, or any kind of use beyond the limits of copyright law requires the written consent of the respective author or creator.
imprints.copyrightText1: Downloads and copies of this site are permitted only for private, non-commercial use. Where content on this website was not created by the operator, the copyrights of third parties are respected. Such third-party content is marked accordingly.
imprints.copyrightText2: If you nevertheless notice a copyright infringement, please notify us. Upon becoming aware of any legal violations, we will remove such content immediately.
imprints.imageCreditsText: Some images, videos, and icons used on this website were sourced from:

gourmetMachine.title: Gourmet Vending Machine
gourmetMachine.subtitle: Next-generation vending with advanced heating system. Built for modern food service environments.

specifications.title: Technical Specifications
specifications.subtitle: Built with commercial-grade components for reliable, high-volume operation

feature1.title: Smart Heating Technology
feature1.description: Individual heating times per product ensure perfect temperature for every item, from pizza to pre-cooked meals.

feature2.title: Remote Management
feature2.description: Real-time inventory tracking, sales analytics, and temperature monitoring via cloud dashboard.

feature3.title: Large Capacity Storage
feature3.description: Up to 120+ product slots with adjustable compartment sizes to accommodate various food packaging.

feature4.title: Energy Efficient
feature4.description: Smart power management with standby mode and LED lighting reduces operating costs.

feature5.title: Touchscreen Interface
feature5.description: 15-inch HD display with intuitive navigation, product images, and nutritional information display.

feature6.title: Hygienic Design
feature6.description: Stainless steel construction, antimicrobial surfaces, and automatic cleaning cycles.

accessories.title: Accessories & Add-ons
accessories.subtitle: Customize your vending solution with our range of accessories, payment systems, and smart technology upgrades

pricing.title: Pricing & Financing
pricing.subtitle: Flexible payment options to fit your business needs. All prices exclude VAT.

summer.title: Summer Leasing
summer.description: Perfect for seasonal venues, festivals, and outdoor locations

winter.title: Winter Leasing
winter.description: Ideal for ski resorts, indoor events, and holiday markets

customQuote.text: Have questions? Our team will help you find the best solution.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about the Gourmet Vending Machine
faq.question1: What products can be sold in the Gourmet Vending Machine?
faq.answer1: The machine can hold a variety of packaged or fresh food items, depending on your setup. Most common items include meals, snacks, and beverages.
faq.question2: How does the heating system work?
faq.answer2: The machine uses a built-in automated heating module that warms the product only after a purchase is made, ensuring safety and freshness.
faq.answer3: The machine operates on a standard electrical connection. No special installation is required for most locations.
faq.answer4: Inventory is tracked through an automated system that shows real-time stock levels and alerts when items need refilling.
faq.answer5: The machine supports multiple payment methods including cashless options like cards, UPI, QR payments, and mobile wallets.
faq.question6: What is included in the installation?
faq.answer6: Installation typically includes setup, calibration, testing, and basic training to help you operate the machine smoothly.
faq.answer7: Basic maintenance can be done on-site, while technical or hardware issues are managed by the support team as part of the service plan.
faq.question8: What happens if the machine breaks down?
faq.answer8: A support ticket can be raised, and a technician will troubleshoot remotely or visit the location depending on the issue.
faq.question9: Can the machine be customized with our branding?
faq.answer9: Yes, the exterior design and interface can be customized with your brand colors, logo, and promotional graphics.
faq.question10: What food safety certifications does the machine have?
faq.answer10: The machine follows standard food safety requirements and components are compliant with industry-approved guidelines.

specifications.title: Technical Specifications

hero.title: Camp Grounds
hero.subtitle: NAF Vending Solutions
hero.description: Premium automated food solutions for the hospitality industry. Serve your guests around the clock without operational complexity.

content.paragraph1: Campgrounds and outdoor recreation sites often operate in remote or decentralized locations where traditional food service options are limited. Guests expect flexible access to food, drinks, and essentials at any time of day, while operators aim to minimize staffing and infrastructure complexity.
content.paragraph2: NAF vending solutions provide a reliable, automated way to offer food and beverages 24/7‚Äîwithout adding pressure to hotel staff or existing kitchen operations.

availability.title: 24/7 Availability
availability.description: 24/7 access to food and drinks for campers

staffing.title: Reduced Staffing Needs
staffing.description: Reliable operation in remote or decentralized locations

deployment.title: Quick Deployment
deployment.description: Low operational overhead and easy maintenance

machines.title: Suitable Automat Types
machines.description: Choose from our range of premium vending solutions, each designed to meet specific hospitality needs

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our Camp Grounds vending solutions

questions.question1: Can the machines be used in outdoor environments?
questions.answer1: Machines should be installed in weather-protected or indoor areas to ensure reliable operation.
questions.question2: Are the machines suitable for seasonal use?
questions.answer2: Yes. They can be operated seasonally and adjusted based on campground activity.
questions.answer3: Machines can be temporarily deactivated or stocked with fewer products as needed.
questions.answer4: Machines require a standard power connection and can be adapted to site infrastructure.
questions.answer5: Payment options depend on configuration and can support cashless and digital methods.
questions.question6: How often do machines need restocking?
questions.answer6: Restocking frequency depends on usage volume and product selection.
questions.question7: Can multiple machines be managed together?
questions.answer7: Yes. Multiple machines can be monitored and managed centrally.

hero.title: Cities & Municipalities
hero.subtitle: NAF Vending Solutions
hero.description: Premium automated food solutions for public spaces. Serve residents, commuters, and visitors around the clock without operational complexity.

content.paragraph1: Cities and municipalities manage a wide range of public spaces used by residents, commuters, and visitors throughout the day. Providing reliable access to food and beverages in these areas can be challenging due to varying demand, decentralized locations, and limited staffing.
content.paragraph2: NAF vending solutions enable cities to offer modern, self-service food infrastructure that operates continuously and integrates well into public environments.

availability.title: 24/7 Availability
availability.description: 24/7 access to food and drinks in public areas

staffing.title: Reduced Staffing Needs
staffing.description: Minimal need for staffed food services

hygiene.title: Contactless & Hygienic
hygiene.description: Cashless and hygienic operation for users

quality.title: Consistent Quality
quality.description: Reliable quality of food and drinks

integration.title: Flexible Integration
integration.description: Scalable deployment across multiple city sites

machines.description: Choose from our range of premium vending solutions, each designed to meet specific city and public-space needs

questions.answer3: Yes. Return automats can be integrated into reuse programs.

questions.answer4: Machines can be managed centrally across multiple sites.
questions.answer5: Payment options depend on configuration and local requirements.

questions.answer6: Branding and information displays can be customized per project.
questions.question7: Is the system suitable for pilot projects?
questions.answer7: Yes. The solution supports phased rollouts and pilot deployments.

hero.title: Clinics & Pharmacies
hero.subtitle: NAF Vending Solutions
hero.description: Premium automated food solutions for healthcare environments. Serve staff, patients, and visitors around the clock with hygienic, contactless operation.

content.paragraph1: Clinics and pharmacies operate in environments where hygiene, reliability, and accessibility are essential. Patients, visitors, and staff often require quick access to food and beverages during long waiting times, late hours, or night shifts, while operators must maintain strict standards and minimize disruption.
content.paragraph2: NAF vending solutions provide a dependable, contactless food option that fits seamlessly into healthcare-focused settings.

availability.title: 24/7 Availability

factories.heroSubtitle: Premium automated food solutions for the hospitality industry. Serve your guests around the clock without operational complexity.
factories.introText1: Factories and industrial sites often operate in multiple shifts, including nights and weekends. Employees require reliable access to food and beverages regardless of working hours, while operators need solutions that function without constant staffing or downtime.
factories.introText2: NAF vending solutions provide consistent, automated food access designed to support continuous operations in demanding industrial environments.
factories.advantage1Desc: 24/7 food availability for all shift schedules
factories.advantage2Desc: Reduced dependence on staffed canteens and night services
factories.advantage4Desc: Cashless and fast payment options for employees
factories.advantage5Desc: Scalable deployment across large industrial sites
factories.suitableSubtitle: Choose from our range of premium vending solutions, each designed to meet specific hospitality needs

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our automated vending solutions for industrial environments
faq.question1: Can machines handle heavy daily usage?
faq.answer1: Yes. Machines are designed for continuous operation in high-demand environments.
faq.question2: Are the machines suitable for night shifts?
faq.answer2: Yes. Machines operate independently of staffing and opening hours.
faq.question3: Can machines be placed close to production areas?
faq.answer3: Yes, provided safety and facility guidelines are followed.
faq.question4: How are machines restocked without disrupting operations?
faq.answer4: Restocking can be scheduled during low-impact periods.
faq.question5: Do employees need an app to access the machines?
faq.answer5: Access methods depend on configuration and can include app-based options.
faq.question6: Can multiple factories be managed together?
faq.answer6: Yes. Centralized management supports multi-site operations.
faq.question7: Is the system compliant with workplace regulations?
faq.answer7: The system is designed to support compliance with relevant operational standards.

offices.heroSubtitle: Premium automated food solutions for the hospitality industry. Serve your guests around the clock without operational complexity.
offices.introText1: Offices and corporate buildings host employees with varied schedules, hybrid work models, and limited time for breaks. Traditional cafeterias often operate only during fixed hours, leaving gaps in food availability during early mornings, late evenings, or overtime work.
offices.introText2: NAF vending solutions provide flexible, self-service food access that fits seamlessly into modern workplace environments.
offices.advantage3Desc: Fast, convenient meal options during short breaks
offices.advantage5Desc: Scalable deployment across office floors and locations

faq.answer2: Yes. NAF vending machines operate independently of staffing and are available around the clock.
faq.question3: Can the machines support different guest payment methods?
faq.answer3: Payment options depend on configuration and can include cashless and digital payment methods.
faq.question4: Is the system suitable for hotels with international guests?
faq.answer4: Yes. The user interface is intuitive and can support multilingual experiences.
faq.question5: Do machines replace room service or restaurant offerings?
faq.answer5: No. They complement existing services by covering late hours, peak times, or unattended periods.
faq.question6: How much space is required for installation?
faq.answer6: Space requirements vary by machine type and can be adapted to available areas.
faq.question7: Can multiple hotel locations be managed together?
faq.answer7: Yes. Machines across different hotels or resort areas can be managed centrally.

nafAI.heroSubtitle: Intelligent automation designed to support the NAF ecosystem with smarter operations and future-ready architecture.
nafAI.featureOverviewText1: NAF AI enhances system logic, operational efficiency, and decision support by enabling smarter interactions between vending machines, cloud systems, and software modules.
nafAI.featureOverviewText2: The system focuses on reliability, scalability, and future-ready architecture rather than black-box automation.
nafAI.howItWorksSubtitle: NAF AI operates as a logic and intelligence layer within the NAF platform
nafAI.howItWorksFeature1: Processes operational data from machines and cloud services
nafAI.howItWorksFeature2: Supports rule-based automation and smart workflows
nafAI.howItWorksFeature3: Enhances system responsiveness and operational control.
nafAI.howItWorksFeature4: Designed to evolve as additional AI-driven capabilities are introduced
nafAI.benefit2: Smarter system behavior without manual intervention
nafAI.benefit3: Scalable intelligence layer across multiple locations.
nafAI.benefit5: Seamless integration with NAF Cloud and machine infrastructure
nafAI.industryComplianceSubtitle: NAF AI operates within the same compliance framework as the NAF platform
nafAI.answer1: No. NAF AI supports automation and system intelligence but remains fully controllable by operators.
nafAI.question2: Does NAF AI replace human decision-making?
nafAI.answer2: No. It enhances operations and supports decisions while keeping control with the customer.
nafAI.question3: Is NAF AI required to use NAF machines?
nafAI.answer3: No. It is an optional enhancement within the broader NAF platform.

telemetryMonitoring.heroSubtitle: Intelligent automation designed to support the NAF ecosystem with smarter operations and future-ready architecture.
telemetryMonitoring.featureOverviewText1: Telemetry & Monitoring provides real-time visibility into vending machine status, performance, and operational health. It enables operators to track machines remotely, identify issues early, and maintain reliable service across all locations.
telemetryMonitoring.featureOverviewText2: This solution is designed to support stable operations and reduce manual checks without adding complexity.
telemetryMonitoring.howItWorksSubtitle: The telemetry system continuously collects operational data from connected machines and transmits it securely to the NAF Cloud.
telemetryMonitoring.howItWorksFeature1: Monitoring machine availability and system status
telemetryMonitoring.howItWorksFeature3: Centralized overview across multiple machines and locations
telemetryMonitoring.benefit5: Less manual inspection and on-site checks
telemetryMonitoring.industryComplianceSubtitle: Telemetry & Monitoring is built to align with industry and regulatory requirements, including:
telemetryMonitoring.Faq1Question: Do I need special hardware to use telemetry?
telemetryMonitoring.Faq1Answer: Telemetry is integrated into compatible NAF vending machines and does not require additional external hardware.
telemetryMonitoring.Faq2Question: Can I monitor multiple locations at once?
telemetryMonitoring.Faq2Answer: Yes. The system is designed to manage single machines or large, distributed networks.
telemetryMonitoring.Faq3Question: Does the system notify me of issues automatically?
telemetryMonitoring.Faq3Answer: Yes. Alerts and status updates are available within the monitoring interface.

payment.heroSubtitle: Intelligent automation designed to support the NAF ecosystem with smarter operations and future-ready architecture.
payment.featureOverviewText1: The NAF Payments solution enables secure, flexible, and cashless transactions across NAF vending machines and digital platforms. It is designed to support modern payment methods while meeting operational and regulatory requirements in unattended retail environments.
payment.featureOverviewText2: The system integrates seamlessly with machines, mobile apps, and cloud services to ensure a smooth payment experience for users and operators.
payment.howItWorksSubtitle: NAF Payments connects vending machines and digital services to approved payment providers through a secure, cloud-based infrastructure.
payment.howItWorksFeature3: Centralized payment management via NAF Cloud
payment.benefit2: Reduced handling of cash and manual processes
payment.benefit3: Improved user experience with Scan & Pay
payment.benefit5: Scalable payment setup for multiple locations
payment.complianceSubtitle: The Payments solution is designed to support compliance with relevant industry and regulatory standards, including:
payment.answer1: Supported payment methods depend on configuration and region, including cashless and mobile-based payments.
payment.question2: Is Scan & Pay available for all machines?
payment.answer2: Scan & Pay is available on compatible machines and requires integration with the NAF mobile app.
payment.answer3: Yes. All transactions can be viewed and managed through the NAF Cloud platform.

cloudKitchen.title: Cloud Kitchen System
cloudKitchen.subtitle: Intelligent automation designed to support the NAF ecosystem with smarter operations and future-ready architecture.

complianceCards.card2: Compatibility with regulated food vending environments
complianceCards.card3: Support for hygiene and operational standards

cloudKitchen.featureOverviewText1: The Cloud Kitchen System connects food preparation, vending machines, and digital ordering into a centralized software workflow. It enables operators to manage production, distribution, and availability across multiple locations from a single system.
cloudKitchen.featureOverviewText2: The solution is designed for efficiency, consistency, and scalable food operations.
cloudKitchen.howItWorksSubtitle: The system acts as a coordination layer between kitchens and vending machines.
cloudKitchen.howItWorksFeature1: Centralized management of food preparation workflows
cloudKitchen.howItWorksFeature2: Synchronization between kitchen output and machine availability
cloudKitchen.howItWorksFeature3: Digital coordination of production and distribution
cloudKitchen.howItWorksFeature4: Integration with NAF Cloud and vending infrastructure
cloudKitchen.benefit5: Better coordination between kitchen and vending teams
cloudKitchen.industryComplianceSubtitle: The Cloud Kitchen System is designed to support compliance with food service and digital operation requirements, including:
cloudKitchen.complianceCard1Desc: Supports food handling and safety process documentation.
cloudKitchen.complianceCard2Desc: Ensures traceability and digital workflow consistency.
cloudKitchen.question1: Is the Cloud Kitchen System required to operate vending machines?
cloudKitchen.answer1: No. It is an optional system for operators managing centralized or multi-location food preparation.
cloudKitchen.answer2: Yes. The system is designed to coordinate multiple kitchens and distribution points.
cloudKitchen.question3: Does it integrate with other NAF solutions?
cloudKitchen.answer3: Yes. It integrates with NAF Cloud, machines, and related software modules.
cloudKitchen.faqSubtitle: Everything you need to know about Cloud Kitchen System

reuseReturn.heroSubtitle: Intelligent automation designed to support the NAF ecosystem with smarter operations and future-ready architecture.
reuseReturn.featureOverviewText1: The Reuse & Return Ecosystem supports sustainable food distribution by enabling reusable packaging and structured return processes within the NAF vending environment. It helps operators reduce single-use waste while offering users a simple and practical return experience.
reuseReturn.featureOverviewText2: The system is designed to work across multiple locations and use cases, supporting circular consumption models in unattended retail.
reuseReturn.howItWorksSubtitle: The ecosystem connects vending machines, digital systems, and return automats to manage reusable items efficiently.
reuseReturn.howItWorksFeature1: Distribution of products in reusable containers
reuseReturn.howItWorksFeature2: Dedicated return automats for easy item returns
reuseReturn.howItWorksFeature3: Digital tracking of returns via the NAF platform
reuseReturn.howItWorksFeature4: Integration with membership and payment systems
reuseReturn.benefit2: Support for sustainable and circular business models
reuseReturn.benefit5: Scalable solution for cities, campuses, and enterprises
reuseReturn.industryComplianceSubtitle: The Reuse & Return Ecosystem is designed to align with environmental and operational regulations, including:
reuseReturn.question1: Do users need a membership to return items?
reuseReturn.answer1: Return processes can be configured to work with or without membership, depending on the setup.
reuseReturn.question2: Can the system be used across multiple locations?
reuseReturn.answer2: Yes. The ecosystem is designed for multi-location and city-wide deployments.
reuseReturn.answer3: Return automats are recommended for structured reuse workflows but can be adapted based on project needs.
reuseReturn.faqSubtitle: Everything you need to know about Reuse & Return Ecosystem

softwareIntegrations.heroSubtitle: Intelligent automation designed to support the NAF ecosystem with smarter operations and future-ready architecture.
softwareIntegrations.featureOverviewText1: Software Integrations enable the NAF platform to connect seamlessly with third-party systems used by operators, partners, and enterprises. This allows vending operations to fit smoothly into existing digital infrastructures without the need for isolated or manual processes.
softwareIntegrations.featureOverviewText2: The integration layer is designed for flexibility, scalability, and long-term compatibility.
softwareIntegrations.howItWorksSubtitle: NAF Software Integrations provide structured connections between the NAF platform and external systems.
softwareIntegrations.howItWorksFeature1: Integration with ERP and enterprise systems
softwareIntegrations.howItWorksFeature2: Connectivity with payment providers and financial platforms
softwareIntegrations.howItWorksFeature3: Data exchange with operational and reporting tools
softwareIntegrations.howItWorksFeature4: Secure APIs for custom and partner integrations
softwareIntegrations.benefit1: Seamless connection with existing business systems
softwareIntegrations.benefit2: Reduced manual data entry and duplication
softwareIntegrations.benefit4: Flexible integration options for different business needs
softwareIntegrations.benefit5: Scalable architecture for future system expansion
softwareIntegrations.industryComplianceSubtitle: Software Integrations are designed to align with enterprise and regulatory standards, including:
softwareIntegrations.answer1: Integration options depend on project scope and requirements, including ERP, payment, and enterprise platforms.
softwareIntegrations.answer2: Yes. Custom integrations can be developed using secure APIs.
softwareIntegrations.answer3: Integrations are managed centrally through the NAF platform with support from the NAF team.
softwareIntegrations.faqSubtitle: Everything you need to know about Software Integrations

support.description: Have a question, issue, or feedback? Use the form below to contact our support team. Whether you're a user, member, or partner, we'll review your request and get back to you as soon as possible.
support.subject: Subject

faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about NAF support
faq.question1: Who can use this support form?
faq.answer1: Anyone using NAF machines, the mobile app, or NAF Cloud services.
faq.answer2: For urgent machine issues, please mark your request as "Technical Issue" and include the machine ID.
faq.answer3: Yes. You'll receive an email confirming that your request was submitted.
faq.question4: Can I submit feedback without an account?
faq.answer4: Yes. An account is not required to submit feedback.

workflow.title: What Happens Next?
workflow.step1Desc: Your request is securely sent to our support team
workflow.step2Desc: We review the details and assign it to the right department
workflow.step3Desc: You'll receive a response via email as soon as possible

membershipinfo.oneAccountDesc: Your NAF account brings together Membership benefits, Wallet payments, and app features like food reservation and Scan & Pay in one simple experience.
membershipinfo.featureCardMembershipDesc: Access exclusive benefits and faster checkout
membershipinfo.featureCardAppDesc: Reserve, scan & pay from your phone
membershipinfo.membershipBenefitsTitle: Benefits That Make Every Purchase Easier
membershipinfo.membershipBenefitsDesc: NAF Membership is built for convenience and frequent use‚Äîideal for offices, campuses, and daily food access.
membershipinfo.benefitFasterCheckout: Faster checkout with your saved account
membershipinfo.benefitCentralAccess: Central access to your account activity
membershipinfo.benefitMemberOffers: Member-only offers and coupons (if available at your location)
membershipinfo.benefitSeamlessExperience: Seamless experience across supported machines and locations
membershipinfo.walletDesc: Use your Wallet balance to pay quickly where enabled‚Äîperfect for repeat purchases and employee programs.
membershipinfo.appTitle: Everything Works Better in the NAF App
membershipinfo.appDesc: Once you have an account, the NAF app gives you full control‚Äîbefore you arrive at the machine and at pickup.
membershipinfo.appFeatureFoodReservationDesc: Reserve your meal in advance so it's ready when you arrive.
membershipinfo.appFeatureScanPayDesc: Pay quickly using your phone for a fast, contactless experience.
membershipinfo.appFeatureLiveMenuDesc: See what's available right now at participating machines.
membershipinfo.appFeatureMachineLocatorDesc: Find nearby NAF machines and choose the most convenient one.
membershipinfo.step1Desc: Enter your email and select Continue
membershipinfo.step2Desc: If your email exists, enter your password to log in
membershipinfo.step3Desc: If you're new, complete sign up in a few steps
membershipinfo.step4Desc: Access Membership, Wallet, and app features from your account
membershipinfo.faqQuestion1: Why do you ask for email first?
membershipinfo.faqAnswer1: It helps route you to the correct step‚Äîlog in if you already have an account, or sign up if you're new.
membershipinfo.faqQuestion2: Do I need Membership to use NAF machines?
membershipinfo.faqAnswer2: Not always. Access depends on the location and machine configuration.
membershipinfo.faqQuestion3: Can I use the app without the Wallet?
membershipinfo.faqAnswer3: Yes. Wallet is optional, depending on available payment methods.
membershipinfo.faqAnswer4: Availability depends on the machine and location setup.
membershipinfo.faqQuestion5: Can I reserve food at any machine?
membershipinfo.faqAnswer5: Food reservation is available on participating machines where enabled.
membershipinfo.faqQuestion6: I forgot my password‚Äîwhat should I do?
membershipinfo.faqAnswer6: On the password screen, select Forgot Password to reset it.
membershipinfo.faqSubtitle: Find answers to frequently asked questions about NAF Membership
